title: How to Make a Baltimore Zoo Drink

steps.headline: Add the shot of vodka to a highball glass.
Add the shot of light rum to the highball glass.
Add the shot of gin to the highball glass.
Add the shot of triple sec to the highball glass.
Add the shot of peach liquor to the highball glass.
Add the shot of amaretto almond liquor to the highball glass.
Add the grenadine syrup to the highball glass.
Add ice to the highball glass.
Top everything off with the sweet and sour mix.

text: Add the shot of vodka to a highball glass.  Add the shot of light rum to the highball glass.  Add the shot of gin to the highball glass.  Add the shot of triple sec to the highball glass.  Add the shot of peach liquor to the highball glass.  Add the shot of amaretto almond liquor to the highball glass.  Add the grenadine syrup to the highball glass.  Add ice to the highball glass.  Top everything off with the sweet and sour mix.  Add the splash of beer.  Stir well.  Finished.
